Hero.Title: Frame by frame, * we tell your story
Hero.Subtitle: We transform your visions into mind-blowing videos that * will have you saying, "Wow!"

Videography.Title: Videography
Videography.Subtitle: Our video production services are designed to take your content to the next level. From viral-worthy promos that'll make heads turn to expert video editing that adds that extra oomph to your footage, we've got the skills and creativity to make it happen.

Video editing.Title: Video editing
Video editing.Subtitle: Professional video editing that transforms raw footage into engaging, high-quality content. Whether for social media, branding, or promotions, we craft visually stunning videos that captivate your audience. Let’s bring your vision to life!

Photography.Title: Photography
Photography.Subtitle: High-quality photography that captures your brand, products, and moments with precision. Perfect for social media, marketing, and professional branding. Book a shoot and make your visuals stand out!

Drone filming.Title: Drone filming
Drone filming.Subtitle: See your story from a whole new angle. Whether it’s for a business, event, or just something epic, our drone footage brings a fresh perspective. Let’s take it to the skies – reach out today!

Testimonials.Title: Don’t take our word for it, * take theirs

Testimonial0.Name: Chris Martin
Testimonial0.Position: Video editing for an online course
Testimonial0.Text: Nevena exceeded my expectations! 5+ Stars!! I asked Nevena to edit an educational video. Nevena has a fantastic creative mindset, top notch attention to detail, and perfect communication. Her first draft was excellent! I highly recommend Nevena, and I looking forward to working with her again!

Testimonial1.Name: Briana Beth
Testimonial1.Text: Yume Visuals truly IMPRESSED with their video editing skills, showcasing exceptional storytelling. Working with them was an absolute delight as they went above and beyond, responding swiftly and demonstrating a deep understanding of my vision. Highly recommend them for any project.

Testimonial2.Name: Amber Johnson
Testimonial2.Text: Nevena just gets it RIGHT every single time! I love working with her!! This is my third time and I for see myself working on many projects with her in the future

Testimonial3.Name: Chris Hartigan
Testimonial3.Text: Nevena Deljanin is an ABSOLUTE GEM in video editing! She exceeded my expectations with her meticulous attention to detail, and her quick responsiveness made collaborating a breeze. Highly recommend!

Testimonial4.Name: Nick Keys
Testimonial4.Text: What an absolute delight working with Nevena. She is such a wonderful visual storyteller and I can't wait to work with her again. Absolutely wonderful. Thank you!

Testimonial5.Name: Bezika Brand
Testimonial5.Text: Filip is an exceptional videographer! His creativity and keen eye for detail shine through in every project. He has a unique ability to capture moments beautifully and turn them into stunning visual stories.

List.Question0: What types of videos do you create?
List.Answer0: We specialize in social media content, online courses, product videos, event videos, vlogs and more.
List.Question1: How long does it take to complete a video project?
List.Answer1: The timeline depends on the project scope, but most videos take between 3-10 days from shooting to final delivery.
List.Question2: Can I provide my own footage for editing?
List.Answer2: Absolutely! We can edit your raw footage, enhance it with effects, and optimize it for your platform of choice.
List.Question3: What’s included in your videography service?
List.Answer3: Our service covers pre-production (planning), shooting with professional equipment, and post-production editing.
List.Question4: Do you have licensed drone operators?
List.Answer4: Yes, Filip is fully certified and follows all legal regulations for aerial filming.
List.Answer5: Yes, we typically require a deposit to secure your booking, with the remainder due upon project completion.

Contact.Title: Let’s create *something amazing
Contact.Subtitle: Have a project in mind or need more information about our services? We’d love to hear from you. * Get in touch to bring your vision to life with Yume Visuals.

MessageInput.Title: Video in mind
MessageInput.Placeholder: I need you to edit my wedding videos...

Hero.Description1: Nevena & Filip, your go-to video wizards! 🎥✨ We have been doing video editing and videography for what feels like, well, 100 years, so with a century's worth of editing and videography passion, we turned our love for capturing travel adventures, daily life, and everything in between into Yume Videos! 🌟 Need killer social media vids, online course magic, epic video ads or any other types of videos? You're in the right spot! Let's bring your ideas to life! 🔥
Hero.Description2: Picture this: I was chilling one day, some time during highschooler times, watching this epic film by Kurosawa called “Yume” ( which means dream in Japanese, FYI🤗) And it was mind-blowing, and all about his dreams obviously. So it got me thinking… why not capture my own dreams on the big screen?🤔 That’s when the lightbulb moment hit me💡, and I decided to chase my dreams at film school. And ta-da🥁, that’s how my epic cinematography journey began! So, every time you see Yume Visuals, remember it’s all about bringing dreams to life through our lenses. Stay tuned for the magic we create!
Hero.Description3: We specialize in creating various types of photo or video content for you or your brand. 🎥Whether it's for social media, your website, or any other purpose, we've got you covered. Filip is also equipped with special drone flying skills to capture some amazing aerial shots.
